title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 217-1.1 - Definitions and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 217-1.1 - Definitions and applicability

State Regulations
(a) For the purposes of this Subpart: (1)
payer shall mean an insurer authorized to write accident and health insurance or that is licensed pursuant to article 43 of the New York Insurance Law, or an entity certified pursuant to article 44 of the Public Health Law; and
(2)
submitted on paper shall include claims submitted on paper or by facsimile. (b) This Subpart shall apply to all health care claims submitted under contracts or agreements issued or entered into pursuant to article 32, 42 or 43 of the Insurance Law or article 44 of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
217-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
